Package com.fssa.freshnest.dao

Class UserDAO

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.freshnest.dao.UserDAO
public class UserDAO extends Object
This class provides data access methods to interact with the user database table.

    • createUser

      public boolean createUser(User user) throws DAOException
      Creates a new user record in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing user information.
      Returns:
      True if the user is successfully created, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser(User user, User email) throws DAOException
      Updates the user's information in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing updated user information.
      email - The email of the user whose information is to be updated.
      Returns:
      True if the user information is successfully updated, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.
